descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://img35.imageshack.us/img35/8789/bastardtitle.png[/img][/center]

[center][b]Featured Video:[/b][/center]
[center][youtube]bSsc6DQu888[/youtube][/center]

=================
Requirements:
=================

Skyrim 1.9.32.0

=================
Description:
=================

The Bastard is a Bastard Sword(Two Handed) that is available through crafting. The Bastard can be found under the Steel Material section and comes in four variations, one with a black grip and the other with a brown grip and then a blue and red with matching scabbard. Both versions come with a scabbard.

The Bastard has slightly better stats than a vanilla Steel Greatsword, it\'s a little lighter and faster but has a shorter reach.

=================
Change log:
=================

1.2 - Fixed: 1H Crafting Recipe
      Added: Blue and Red colour variations

1.1 - Fixed: Blood effects
      Added: One-Handed Version
      Tweak: Lightened the colours a little.

=================
Installation
=================

1. Extract the contents of the ZIP folder into your Data folder
2. Make sure the The Bastard.esp is checked in the Launcher

=================
Un-Installation:
=================

1. Delete the files/folders associated with the mod
2. Uncheck the The Bastard.esp is checked in the Launcher

=================
Contact:
=================

InsanitySorrow @ TES Alliance

=================
Credits:
=================

Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.

=================
Tools Used:
=================

Insanity\'s ReadMe Generator
Photoshop CS5
Blender
Marmoset Toolbag - For the Render

=================
Licensing/Legal:
=================

You may use this as you wish as long as you don\'t charge money for it and you credit me for any work used.

Please do not re-host this file without my explicit permission. 

==================
Modder\'s Will:
==================

If I am offline for six months or longer and do not respond to any attempts made at contacting me, I give full Ownership of my Projects to TES Alliance.

TES Alliance are free to modify/redistribute/remove as they see fit.
